bot.description: Bot that bets on the team with the most bets, increasing its bet by 100 + 10 * (difference in bet count).

param.description: type of bet this bot makes
This field allows a bot's bet amount algorithm to be customized with a mathematical expression

bot.param: min(mxBet, mnBet + 10 * (max(leftScore, rightScore) - min(leftScore, rightScore)), balance)

param.description: personality of bot

bot.description: Bot that bets on the team with the most bets, increasing its bet by 100 + (difference in bet count)^2. This means the difference in bet count is the number to increase by, and the multiplier on that value.

param.description: type of bet this bot makes
This field allows a bot's bet amount algorithm to be customized with a mathematical expression

bot.param: min(mxBet, mnBet + 10 * (max(leftScore, rightScore) - min(leftScore, rightScore)^2), balance)

param.description: personality of bot
